1�Unh... Ungh...
1�Who are you...? Not a foe, it seems...I am glad you've found me.I am Jima, Ambassador of San d'Oria.
1�So you were sent on a mission to the embassy in Jeuno?I see. I am truly sorry you had to come to such a dangerous place as this.
1�Sorrier still am I that I was fool enough to let down my guard. I was struck from behind, and I woke to find myself here. To think, if you hadn't happened by...
1�This is a truly dangerous place, and not just because of the monsters. There is an ominous feel to the air...
1�Going deeper would be folly.Take care, kind adventurer. I will leave this place while I still can, and we shall meet again at the embassy.
1�You see nothing of particular interest.
1�Who are you? Not an enemy, at any rate.I'm glad you found me.I am ambassador Altair from Bastok.
1�What? You were sent on a mission for the embassy...?I see. My apologies...if it weren't for me, you wouldn't have had to come to such a dangerous place.
1�I should never have let my guard down...I was struck from behind, and the next thing I knew, I woke up here.I shudder to think at what would have happened to me if you hadn't come.
1�This place is dangerous...but not only because of the monsters. I sense something more ominous in the air...
1�In any case, we should get out of here as soon as possible.I can find my way out. Come meet me at the embassy when you can.
1�You see nothing of particular interest.
1�Who...? Oh, I'm so glad you're not one of the baddies.Thank you for saving me! I'm the Windurstian ambassador to Jeuno, Heimji-Keimji.
1�They sent you on a mission to the embassy?Oh... I'm sorry-worry you had to come to such a dangerous place because of me.

1�I should have been more careful... Someone bonky-wonked me on the head from behind, and I woke up in this hairy-scary place. If you hadn't come... It makes me shudder-budder to think what would've happened to me!
1�This place is dangerous! Aside from all the monsters, I feel something nasty-wasty in the air.
1�We should go back as soon as possible!Don't worry about me, as I can run super-duper fast! I'll meet you back at the embassy!
1�Sorry about making you wait, Lion. Now let's get going.
1�You mean you didn't bring it?
1�I am sorry. My name is Aldo, head of the Tenshodo.
1�Just hold on a little bit longer, Verena. I'm coming.
1�What exactly is going on here? There was no reason for Verena to be involved in the first place.
1�The problem is, we can't get near them without 6????.
1�Don't worry.
1�The same as you. Isn't that good enough an answer?
1�We knew you would have it. So, we're coming along for the ride.
1�Whatever.Aldo, let's go.
1�He never changes.
1�You again. What business do you have coming here?
1�I need no companions on my journey.And what do you think you can accomplish, coming here without 6?????
1�Do as you wish.
1�Zeid...Just make sure you don't get in my way.
1�Listen up, adventurers! You are to keep clear of Delkfutt's Tower! That's an order!
1�But what really is going on in there...?Why did the society call for our assistance...?
1�Follow me and keep on guard!
1�What the...!?
1�What the hell happened here...?Are there any survivors?
1�What is it, soldier?
1�He's still breathing.If we can revive him, he might be able to tell us what on Vana'diel happened here.
1�Get me Monber... Someone call the infirmary!
1�What are your orders, sir?
n!�Captain! The door...
1�Why do we have to wait out here? What do they think we are, door boys? It's like they don't trust us...
1�Sir, yes sir!
1�The northern line...The flow of energy has begun to reverse!
1�That's impossibl
e!�Children of Vana'diel, I, Bahamut, ruler of the skies, have come to deliver you a warning!
1�The time has come...The arrival of the Keeper of the Apocalypse is near!
1�Come forth, my minions! Let the blood of the gods spill forth on the soil of their creation.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Appointment to Jeuno.Jeuno.A New Journey.Return to Delkfutt's Tower.The Rites of Life(pt.1).The Rites of Life(pt.2).The Rites of Life(pt.3).The Rites of Life(pt.4).The Rites of Life(pt.5).Pride and Honor.Hyper Active.Chameleon Capers(pt.1).Chameleon Capers(pt.2).Chameleon Capers(pt.3).Chameleon Capers(pt.4).Banishing the Echo.Crashing Waves(pt.1).Crashing Waves(pt.2).Crashing Waves(pt.3).Crashing Waves(pt.4).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�W-were y-you the one th-th-that defeated the hi-hideous b-b-b-b-beast?
1�Oh, th-thank you s-s-s-so m-much. I-I've b-b-b-b-been t-trying to g-g-get up enough s-s-s-strength to f-face it for the p-p-p-past f-few weeks, b-b-b-but I-I-I-I...
1�<Sigh>N-now I-I-I can f-finally go home.I-I-I-I think it's t-t-time I give up th-th-this adventuring b-b-b-b-business.
1�Hm? R-R-Raibaht s-s-s-sent you?You w-w-want to know wh-wh-where I hid th-the alti-ti-ti-timeter?
1�B-b-b-but without 6????, you'll n-n-never get i-i-it out of J-Jeuno. Y-y-you'll be c-c-caught just like m-m-m-me.
1�Wh-what? You h-have one?W-w-well, then ch-ch-check the s-streetlamps in L-L-L-Lower J-Jeuno. Th-that's where I-I hid th-the altimeter.
1�G-good luck, ?[s-s-sir/m-m-ma'am].N-n-now where's th-th-the exit to this p-p-p-p-place?
1�Where did you get that key?
1�The captain of the Ducal Guard!?
1�Ah, what a grand sight...
1�Protects them...?So, that is the purpose of this tower!?
1�He came...here?
1�Sir Nag'molada! Are you saying that the boy came here via the Crystal Line!?
1�Which means, by traveling back through the line, he can...
1�A terrestrial avatar...?
1�It is all clear now! Phoenix led me to this place to show me the way to the celestial capital of Al'Taieu!
1�Reactivated...? What do you mean by that, Nag'molada?
1�Repaired it!Why would she do such a thing!?
1�That is terrible!If you know of such a battle brewing, why do you not attempt to stop it!?
1�Why must we fight the avatars!? Such a battle would be meaningless! Our true enemies are the Emptiness and the evil boy that is spreading it!
1�The crystal's power?
1�But, Selh'teus first appeared on Vana'diel the same time as Bahamut.
1�In my home nation, there were many reports of the Emptiness eating its way through the land, long before Bahamut even arrived...
1�Wait!You just said that you were ??slowly drawing the light of the crystals??...
1�That would mean that the cause of the Emptiness in the East is you--the Zilart!
1�That is enough!Before I slice you in two, I will give you the opportunity to recall the words of Diabolos!
1�Wake up!You are all bound like marionettes by the chains of Promathia!
1�When the Gates of Paradise open, our world will be no more!
1�What do you mean!?
..�Could it be...?
1�Nag'molada said that the terrestrial avatars are using us... Using us to prevent people from waking up and realizing the truth...?
1�But if that is true...The people who gave their lives for this flame...I... I...
1�Phoenix! Answer me!
1�To grant you this form, lives were lost, villages destroyed...
1�The lifeblood you drank from my people...was it not to save Vana'diel!? Was it not to breathe hope back into her children!?
1�...And once again you tell me to visit Fenrir...
1�Where? The southern tower of Pso'Xja?
1�Is that all!?
1�We shall see what truths the final avatar presents us with. We shall see if we are simply being made fools of!
!?�Excellent timing.Great minds think alike, wouldn't you say,   and Tenzen?
1�I never thought it would be you two who helped me.
1�I, too, have some very important business on the other side of that door.
1�The five mothercrystals...It is this contraption that protects them as they slumber beneath Vana'diel.
1�Exactly.The five crystals are connected by the five Crystal Lines that all converge on this very place.
1�For many centuries we have monitored the lines...protected the radiance of the crystals.
1�However, when the Wyrmking, Bahamut, arrived, the five crystal lines began acting strangely. We could no longer control them.
1�And then came Selh'teus.
1�Exactly. He can reach the fifth crystal. However, it is not as easy as you may think. The lines were not built as a path for men.
1�They were built to gather the light of the mothercrystals.
1�The true reason Selh'teus was able to enter this place was because he was aided by a guardian of the crystals--a terrestrial avatar.
1�Phoenix? Led you here?That is truly unfortunate.If this only had happened before Pso'Xja was reactivated...

1�The ruins of Pso'Xja were once the homes of my Kuluu brothers and sisters. However, at the onset of the Kuluu war with the Zilart, the terrestrial avatars lent us their power and helped transform the area into an impenetrable stronghold.
1�And deep below the ruins is a device that blocks the flow of energy through the Crystal Line. Esha'ntarl has repaired that device...
1�I no longer know what the society is plotting. That is why I came here--to find out their true intentions!
1�Ha ha ha!Are you surprised?
1�I guess that to you we ancients--Kuluu and Zilart--are all the same. However, that could not be further from the truth.

1�The Zilart were blessed with the ability to subliminally communicate with all those around them--they possessed the ??whisper of the soul.?? It was this ability that made the bonds between them unbreakable.
1�However, there were those who were born without the whisper--the Kuluu. My people were destined from birth to sit outside the bonds of the Zilartian community.
1�But we bystanders were able to ascertain the truth, and it was this that helped us survive the crusades of ten thousand years ago.
1�The Zilart, the terrestrial avatars, Selh'teus...Once again, their sins will deface Vana'diel and undermine her children.
1�Hah.Is that what you have to say? Tenzen, when are you going to stop being led around on a leash like a measly dog? When are you going to see what the terrestrial avatars really want?
1�Listen. I told you this once before. Selh'teus is nothing but a traitor.
1�Ten thousand years ago, he prevented the Zilart from obtaining what they desired.Now, he is simply attempting the same thing.
1�The records stored in this Crystal Line observation equipment have shown me the reason why Selh'teus travels to the mothercrystals.
1�By touching the shards, he is able to drain their light...their power.
1�To accomplish our task, we had to gather the power of the crystals and fuse it into one.

1�And to do that, we needed to repair and revive the Zilartian machines that were damaged in the accident that occurred ten thousand years ago. With the machines working again, we were able to slowly draw the light of the crystals.

1�When he realized he could not single-handedly take on the whole nation of Jeuno, he turned to the crystals instead. And when he laid his hands upon them, their power flowed from the facets like water rushing from a broken dam. This sudden loss of power resulted in a disruption in the space surrounding the crystals...
1�Without the life-giving light of the crystals shining upon it, the space became overwhelmed with darkness--with Emptiness.
1�Hmph.I was beginning to wonder when you would realize that, Tenzen.
1�But don't misunderstand us. It was never our intention to harm Vana'diel with the Emptiness.
1�While we lay in slumber for the past ten thousand years, things changed. The crystals changed.
1�Especially the fifth crystal, deep below Al'Taieu.
1�When the celestial capital was destroyed and sunk to the bottom of the sea, the crystal was damaged. The data that it returns is very odd indeed.
1�However, you need not worry. Once the Gate of the Gods is opened, the crystals will return to their former state.
1�And once they do, the Emptiness will disappear in the crystal's radiance, and the Zilart will have accomplished their dream.
1�Only the wretched terrestrial avatars stand in our way...!
1�But with an end always comes a new beginning...
1�Tenzen!Have you asked your precious Phoenix what actually happens when our world ??is no more???
1�Yes.The world we live in now is nothing but an illusion.Compared to Paradise, Vana'diel is a cesspool festering with pain and suffering, lost hopes and dreams...

1�Strict values waver in the winds of uncertainty, while you pilfer your precious time struggling to recognize the truths that peer back at you through the darkness.You are inclined to search aimlessly for hints of who you truly are, though you rarely discover them, and it is this failure that ultimately forces you to tread a vague path through your miserable lives.

1�Strict values waver in the winds of uncertainty, while you pilfer your precious time struggling to recognize the truths that peer back at you through the darkness.You are inclined to search aimlessly for hints of who you truly are, though you rarely discover them, and it is this failure that ultimately forces you to tread a vague path through your miserable lives.

1�Even confessions of the soul result in disagreement and inconsistency, thrusting your pitiful masses into utter chaos.It is this chaos that breeds evil--an evil that propels you into justifying deeds of malevolence to maintain your false sense of purity.
1�You were born into this world and this is the only world you know.That is why you fear its end. You fear it and you fight it.

1�The terrestrial avatars recognized this characteristic of your people and have used it to their advantage. Why? Have you ever wondered why the terrestrial avatars are named so? It is because they, too, were born on Vana'diel. If Vana'diel returns to Paradise, they will be nothing but mere animals!
1�You people are nothing but puppets, your strings tied to the fingers of the terrestrial avatars, destined to a life of slavery. Why not open your eyes to the truth?
1�Now that you realize your true enemies are the avatars who claim to protect you, your journey through the darkness is over.
1�You can leave the rest to me. I shall change your destinies.
1�The light Selh'teus has gathered from the mothercrystals...If the celestial capital of Al'Taieu still does exist, then the Zilart's plan is...
1�This monitoring device will inform me of the crystal's memories... The memories will guide me...
1�Let your memories show me the truth I seek!
1�Argh...I'm only receiving partial data...There's still too much interference coming from the fifth crystal...
1�But that image...I've seen it somewhere before... It was...the Chamber of Eventide.And that was Esha'ntarl!
1�Wow, this place hasn't changed a bi
t.�The last time I was here...
1�I've finally found you, my elusive treasure.
1�Not a few thieves would be keen to get their paws on this.
1�Who's there!?

1�The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called ??Voidwalkers.?? Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.

1�Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.
1�Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed ??Voidwatch Operations,?? or ??Ops?? for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.

1�A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time ??Voidwatcher?? status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.

1�Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.

1�Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.
1�Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.
1�Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.
1�However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.

1�When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.
1�Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.
1�The ??voidstone?? is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.

1�Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.
1�As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.
1�Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.
1�Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.
1�After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.
1�Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.

1�Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.

1�While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.

1�Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items.??
1�Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.
1�Those participating in Voidwatch Ops are recommended to plan ahead in order to make effective use of ascent items.
1�Alignment values can also be raised in the midst of battle by striking at enemy weaknesses, causing their existential attunement to shift to your advantage.

1�Blows can be dealt with abilities such as weapon skills and magic spells, and your choice of weakness and the manner in which you strike it will determine which hue of the alignment spectrum is affected.
1�The existential spectrum is comprised of five lights (blue, red, yellow, green, and white), each of which influences reward yield.
1�The precise workings of each light can be reviewed when examining your current alignment values.
1�Upon the successful conclusion of battle, the alignment bonus as granted by ascent items and the exploitation of enemy weaknesses are combined to determine the spoils.

1�Be forewarned: Voidwalkers are highly guileful beings and will not suffer the same weakness being struck twice. Combatants must be on constant watch for any changes that may occur during the course of battle.

1�The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called ??Voidwalkers.?? Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.

1�Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.
1�Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed ??Voidwatch Operations,?? or ??Ops?? for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.

1�A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time ??Voidwatcher?? status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.

1�Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.

1�Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.
1�Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.
1�Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.
1�However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.

1�When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.
1�Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.
1�The ??voidstone?? is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.

1�Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.
1�As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.
1�Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.
1�Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.
1�After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.
1�Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.

1�Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.

1�While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.

1�Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as ??ascent items.??
1�Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.
1�Those participating in Voidwatch Ops are recommended to plan ahead in order to make effective use of ascent items.
1�Alignment values can also be raised in the midst of battle by striking at enemy weaknesses, causing their existential attunement to shift to your advantage.

1�Blows can be dealt with abilities such as weapon skills and magic spells, and your choice of weakness and the manner in which you strike it will determine which hue of the alignment spectrum is affected.
1�The existential spectrum is comprised of five lights (blue, red, yellow, green, and white), each of which influences reward yield.
1�The precise workings of each light can be reviewed when examining your current alignment values.
